page.title: 16STEWARTON'S JUNE CELEBRATION
page.content: From 8th to 16th June the Bonnet Guild Festival was held this year, the 53rd Corsehill Queen being crowned on Saturday 15th June. On Saturday night June 8th an innovation took place with the first torchlight parade from Cunningham Watt Park to Strandhead Park where a barbeque was held for all the people taking part. Although a wet night the turnout was excellent and the marching torches were quite a spectacle as was the torchlit barbeque and disco which followed at Strandhead. The usual Knockout, Concert, Miss Stewarton Contest, Car and Foot Treasure Hunts, Road Races, Footballl matches, the large colourful Fancy Dress Parade, the Crowning of this year's Corsehill Queen, Aileen Stewart took place finishing with the Church Service in St Columba's Church.
